    • Method Detail

      • buildLineHalfBuffer

        public static IPolygon buildLineHalfBuffer(ILineString line,
                                           double distance,
                                           Side side)
        Builds the half-buffer of a line, i.e. cuts in two the buffer in the middle of the rounded part of the buffer. Be careful, the twisted cases of the corresponding Lull function are not taken into account !
        Parameters:
        line -
        distance -
        vectorLength -
        side -
        Returns:

        public static IPolygon buildSegmentHalfBuffer(ILineSegment line,
                                              double distance,
                                              Side side)

      • getEndingPtsOfRoundPart

        public static HashMap<IDirectPosition,Integer> getEndingPtsOfRoundPart(IDirectPosition point,
                                                                       IRing buffer,
                                                                       double distance)
        This method allows to get the starting and ending points of the round part of a buffer around a line, on one side of the line (represented by the ending point of the line). This method is useful to build a real offset buffer of a line that works with twisted lines.
        Parameters:
        point -
        buffer -
        distance -
        Returns:

      • getSideEndingPtsOfRoundPart

        public static int getSideEndingPtsOfRoundPart(Side side,
                                              boolean start,
                                              IDirectPosition point,
                                              IRing buffer,
                                              double distance)
        Get the first point of the rounded part of a buffer on one side and for one of the endings of the line buffered. The method is useful to build a half offset buffer of a line.
        Parameters:
        side - LEFT or RIGHT
        start - true if the search is around initial point of the line
        point - the initial or final point of the line
        buffer - the buffer of the line
        distance - the distance of the buffer
        Returns:

      • buildHalfOffsetBuffer

        public static IPolygon buildHalfOffsetBuffer(Side side,
                                             ILineString line,
                                             double distance)
        Builds a half offset buffer of a linestring. An offset buffer is like a buffer but without the cap (the round part at the end of the line).
        Parameters:
        side - the side (related to line's initial point) on which the half buffer is built
        line - the line to be buffered
        distance - the buffer distance
        Returns:

      • buildHalfOffsetLine

        public static ILineString buildHalfOffsetLine(Side side,
                                              ILineString line,
                                              double distance)
        Builds a half offset line of a linestring. Be careful, this method return an empty linestring for the interior side of closed line.
        Parameters:
        side - the side (related to line's initial point) on which the half buffer is built
        line - the line to be buffered
        distance - the buffer distance
        Returns:
